data.message:
I'm sure that every piece of shit that is talking shit about u has said some dumb shit before or done some dumb shit. Fuck all the haters. You do you! All these fakes tryna start shit just cause they cant be like you! I would just die of I ever had the chance to make it to one of your concerts. But I am poor and can't afford it lol. But that's ok ill sit back and listen to your music religiously. But like I said it would be a dream come true if you came to texas. There are so many peol
Ole that have lost everything due to Harvey. And i know you rapping won't bring back their homes and their things but showing your support would mean the world to all of us.
